comments_since_last_sample.body: Awww.....everyone lets please send Xico healing energy! 🙌🏽
love this - one of my favs with so many good ideas
I’m obsessed with the green sweater you’re wearing to finalize the room around the 19 minute mark. Can you drop a link for this girl? Thank you!
This is my ALL TIME FAVORITE ROOM MAKEOVER!!!! Ughhhh! I wish you could come do my house 😭😭😭

This is a true transformation, I can see the distinct areas now. That dining room chair is not a goo choice for someone who works from home, it will become increasingly uncomfortable. I think that you could have found a desk chair that was both comfortable to work from, and aesthetically pleasing. Why do you always put down rugs, large or small, that slip and slide on the floor? That seems to be hazardous. It would be best to put the non-slip pads under them to prevent an accident. I think this is my favorite video you've done to get the best use of space in a small (tiny) environment. Great job!
What brand of ceiling hooks do you use? There's no link to those
